#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType StatisticValue.

== Name ==

*[CStatisticValue StatisticValue]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--StatisticValue (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
				Numeric value for a statistic. The name of the statistics is mandatory.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...  
            *name = xs:string*
          >[Sdouble double]</...>

----
          

=== Attributes ===

|| Name || Description || Type || Use || Default || Fixed || Form ||
        
|| name ||   || xs:string || required ||  ||  || unqualified ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CRoundSummary RoundSummary], [CStatistics Statistics]
----
    <xs:complexType name="StatisticValue">  <xs:simpleContent>    <xs:extension base="xs:double">      <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string" use="required"/>    </xs:extension>  </xs:simpleContent></xs:complexType>
----
